text: I give, devise and bequeath all my property, real, personal and mixed, of whatever kind and nature and wheresoever situated, to my two children, [Person-3] and [Person-4], and my granddaughter, [Person-5], in equal shares, an undivided one-third interest each.

texts: all my property, real, personal and mixed, of whatever kind and nature and wheresoever situated
in equal shares, an undivided one-third interest each
